title: Never Grow Up
description: One summer can change everything.Eighteen year old Jude has just two months to figure out what the heck she's going to do with the rest of her life. When her band mates in The Manic Flamingos get jobs and go off to university, Jude feels left behind. When did life get so serious? Even worse than that, the council are splitting up her family, forcing Jude to get a place of her own.But how can Jude do any of that grown up stuff when she can't even pick her favourite band?A milkshake caf√©, an unlikely friendship, and letters from her supermodel sister might just save her in this upbeat, quirky novella told in just over 21,000 words.
author: Ava Bloomfield
